creator: iGP Games
descriptionHtml:
Your Grand Prix Team - build your own formula race team, competing in online multiplayer championships with live races and real-time strategy.

★★★★★ "It's like having your own Formula 1 team but without the politics." - AUTOSPORT

FEATURES

★ Live Race Simulation - The first formula racing manager game to feature online, real-time and interactive race strategy
★ Multiplayer Championships - Create your own league and race with up to 32 people online
★ Cross-device play - Seamless switching between phone, tablet and desktop; even during a live race
★ Augmented-Reality Weather - In Monaco while racing there? Make the split-second decision to pit for wet tyres by checking the sky

ABOUT

iGP Manager first launched as a pioneering browser game in 2011. Now as an app it is rebuilt from the ground up, with all aspects of gameplay revised and improved.
descriptionShort: Your Grand Prix Team. Online and real-time formula race strategy.

appDetails.developerAddress:
iGP Games,
Third Floor 207 Regent Street,
London,
W1B 3HH,
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New! Safety car.
• New! Augmented-Reality Car Editor.
• New! Race interfaces - full live timing, dual car boost and more.
• New! Custom season lengths.
• New! Korean and Norwegian translations.
• Wider range on car setup and development values.
• Various fixes and improvements.

descriptionShort: Your Grand Prix Team. Online and real-time formula race strategy.

appDetails.developerAddress:
iGP Games,
Third Floor 207 Regent Street,
London,
W1B 3HH,
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New! Stunning realistic 3D visuals
• New! Onboard and chase cameras - get closer to the action than ever before
• New! Wheel-to-wheel racing v1.0 - cars will now attempt to race side-by-side when the track is free
• Improved UI in live races
• Improved stability and syncing.
• Various other fixes and improvements.

descriptionShort: Your Grand Prix Team. Online and real-time formula race strategy.

appDetails.developerAddress:
iGP Games,
Third Floor 207 Regent Street,
London,
W1B 3HH,
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New TV Cameras - Stream, broadcast and manage races as a TV feed.
• Visual accuracy of car positions in 2D and 3D live races improved.
• Performance & stability at launch, in runtime and when joining races improved.
• Belgium, China, Malaysia, Mexico and Singapore now in realistic scale with better environments.
• Terrains, surfaces and textures in 3D greatly improved.
• Fixed race viewer sometimes not loading.
• Many other fixes and improvements.

appDetails.developerAddress:
iGP Games,

W1B 3HH,
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New League Rules - Two-tyre rule, No Refuelling, Fastest lap bonus point and more to come
• Improved dirty air physics for closer racing.
• Improved qualifying simulation to better reflect car performance.
• Improved accuracy of connection instability prompts.
• Improved league system showing key information and league ratings.
• Various important fixes and improvements including ANR fixes.
• New translations.

★ Cross-device play - Seamless switching between phone, tablet and desktop; even during a live race
★ Augmented-Reality Weather - In Monaco while racing there? Make the split-second decision to pit for wet tyres by checking the sky

ABOUT

iGP Manager first launched as a pioneering browser game in 2011. Now as an app it is rebuilt from the ground up, with all aspects of gameplay revised and improved.
descriptionShort: Your Grand Prix Team. Online and real-time formula race strategy.

appDetails.developerAddress:
iGP Games,
Third Floor 207 Regent Street,
London,
W1B 3HH,
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New League Rules - Two-tyre rule, No Refuelling, Fastest lap bonus point and more to come
• Improved dirty air physics for closer racing.
• Improved qualifying simulation to better reflect car performance.
• Improved accuracy of connection instability prompts.
• Improved league system showing key information and league ratings.
• Various important fixes and improvements including ANR fixes.
• New translations.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New!
- 2025 Car Model & Livery Editor: Over 302 quintillion paint combos & 3 new finishes.
- Modern UI: Sleek and intuitive.
- 3D Character Editor: Customize your team like never before.
- AI Assistant: Gameplay tips and insights.
- Rookie Sprint Races: Get racing fast and often.

- Enhanced tutorials
- HQ overhaul
- Refined gameplay: Improved Research & Design Caps
